description: All tables related to Dynamics Fraud Protection service offerings such as purchase, purchase status, bank event, refund, chargeback.

tables.name: DFPPurchaseLogs
tables.description: Purchase events evaluated by Dynamics Fraud Protection (DFP).

columns.name: PurchaseId
columns.description: Transaction (or purchase/order) identifier in merchant system.

columns.name: AssessmentType
columns.description: Indicates the assessment type for the event. Possible values are 'Evaluate' or 'Protect'. If not specified, default is 'Protect'.

columns.name: OriginalOrderId
columns.description: Original Order identifier in merchant system for payments for recurring billing like monthly subscriptions.

columns.name: MerchantLocalDate
columns.description: Purchase creation date as per Merchant time-zone. Format is ISO8601.

columns.name: MerchantIdentifier
columns.description: Merchant identifier (MID) for the bank.

columns.name: MerchantCategoryCode
columns.description: Merchant Category Code (MCC) for the bank.

columns.name: MerchantBusinessType
columns.description: Merchant Business Type for this purchase.

columns.name: MerchantBusinessSegment
columns.description: Merchant Business Segment for this purchase.

columns.name: IsTest
columns.description: Signifies that the purchase is a test purchase.

columns.name: IsFreeProdIncluded
columns.description: Signifies if a free product is part of this purchase.

columns.name: IsRecurringCharge
columns.description: Signifies if the purchase is a recurring charge.

columns.name: IsGuestCheckout
columns.description: Signifies if the purchase is being made via gueest checkout.

columns.name: IsRetryOrder
columns.description: Signifies if the purchase is a retry of a previously failed attempt.

columns.name: IsPostpaid
columns.description: Signifies if the purchase is post paid.

columns.name: DistinctItemCount
columns.description: Count of unique products sold as part of the purchase.

columns.name: TotalItemCount
columns.description: Total count of products sold as part of the purchase.

columns.name: OrderType
columns.description: Type of order, for example, Take Out.

columns.name: DiscountAmount
columns.description: Discount provided on the original purchase before deriving the total amount.

columns.name: TotalAmount
columns.description: Total amount charged to the customer; tax and shipping included. Discounts and coupons can be optionally included; there is currently no separate field for them. Provided by the Merchant.

columns.name: Currency
columns.description: Currency of the original purchase in ISO 4217 code format (USD, GBP, etc).

columns.name: ShippingMethod
columns.description: Indicates the method used to ship the purchase. Possible values 'InStorePickup' , 'Standard' , 'Express' , 'DirectEntitlement' , 'DigitalToken'.

columns.name: TxnProcessingOrder
columns.description: The order in which the fraud assessment was made during the transaction flow. Possible values are PREAUTHORIZATION, POSTAUTHORIZATION, BEFORE3DS, AFTER3DS.

columns.name: RecurringChargeSequence
columns.description: The nth (1, 2, 3...) time the recurring charge has occurred for this customer.

columns.name: MidName
columns.description: The merchant name associated with the MID (merchant identifier).

columns.name: TxnDescription
columns.description: The transaction processing type. Possilbe values are SUBSCRIPTIONFEE, DELAYEDCHARGES, NOSHOW, DEPOSIT.

columns.name: ShippingEmail
columns.description: The email for shipping notification.

columns.name: CustomData
columns.description: Key-value pairs that can be passed in for the use of rules, etc.

columns.name: OrderInitiatedChannel
columns.description: The channel where the transaction was created (for example: �AppStore', 'Web', MobileWeb, 'App', �InGamePurchase�).

columns.name: OrderInitiatedChannelName
columns.description: The App Name or Web URL where the transaction was created.

columns.name: MerchantBusinessSegmentL2
columns.description: The second level business or industry segment.

columns.name: UserUserId
columns.description: The user identifier. This information is provided by the merchant.

columns.name: UserCreationDate
columns.description: The creation date of the user account. The format is ISO 8601.

columns.name: UserFirstName
columns.description: The user-provided first name on�the account.

columns.name: UserLastName
columns.description: The user-provided last name�on�the account.

columns.name: UserCountry
columns.description: The user's country or region.�The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.name: UserZipCode
columns.description: The user's postal code.

columns.name: UserPhoneNumber
columns.description: The user's phone number. The format should be the country/region code followed by a hyphen (-) and then the phone number (for example, for the US, +1-1234567890).

columns.name: UserEmail
columns.description: The user's email address. This value is case-insensitive.

columns.name: UserProfileType
columns.description: The user's profile type. Possible values 'Consumer' , 'Seller' , 'Publisher' , 'Tenant' , 'Developer'.

columns.name: UserAuthProvider
columns.description: The user's authentication provider, if different from the merchant's. Possible valuse 'MSA' , 'Facebook' , 'PSN' , 'MerchantAuth' , 'Google'.

columns.name: UserAuthMethod
columns.description: The way in which the customer was authenticated prior/during purchase. Some possible values are PASSWORD-BASED, MULTI-FACTOR, BIOMETRIC, TOKEN-BASED,.

columns.name: UserLoginInputMethod
columns.description: The way in which the customer input their credentials. Possible values are MANUALINPUT, AUTOFILL, SCRIPT, COPYPASTE, SELECTPROFILE.

columns.name: UserLoginChlngType
columns.description: The type of challenge-response test that was initiated. Possible valuees are TEXT SMS, PHONE SMS, EMAIL PIN, CAPTCHA.

columns.name: DvcContextDvcContextId
columns.description: The customer's fingerprinting session ID, or the event ID if the session is not available.

columns.name: DvcContextProvider
columns.description: The provider of device info. Possible values are 'DFPFingerPrinting' , 'Merchant'. If using the DFP Fingerprinting JS script, you must pass 'DFPFingerPrinting' for all data to get properly connected.

columns.name: DvcContextExternalDvcType
columns.description: The customer's device type, as provided and mastered by the merchant. Possible values 'Mobile' , 'Computer' , 'MerchantHardware' , 'Tablet' , 'GameConsole'.

columns.name: DvcContextIpAddress
columns.description: Customer's IP address (provided by Merchant).

columns.name: ExternalDvcAttrOs
columns.description: Operating system provided by merchant.

columns.name: OrgLevel1OrgId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the merchant or organization at level 1.

columns.name: OrgLevel1Name
columns.description: The name of the organization.

columns.name: OrgLevel1ZipCode
columns.description: The zipcode at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel1State
columns.description: The state at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel1CountryISO
columns.description: The countryISO at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel2OrgId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the merchant or organization at level 2.

columns.name: OrgLevel2Name
columns.description: The name of the organization.

columns.name: OrgLevel2ZipCode
columns.description: The zipcode at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel2State
columns.description: The state at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel2CountryISO
columns.description: The countryISO at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel3OrgId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the merchant or organization at level 3.

columns.name: OrgLevel3Name
columns.description: The name of the organization.

columns.name: OrgLevel3ZipCode
columns.description: The zipcode at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel3State
columns.description: The state at where the organization is located.

columns.name: OrgLevel3CountryISO
columns.description: The countryISO at where the organization is located.

columns.name: ThreeDSIsThreeDSAuth
columns.description: A True/False value that indicates whether this transaction is authenticated via 3DS.

columns.name: ThreeDSMessageCategory
columns.description: Identifies the category of the message for a specific use case. .

columns.name: ThreeDSTransStatus
columns.description: Indicates whether a transaction qualifies as an authenticated transaction or account verification.

columns.name: ThreeDSTransStatusReason
columns.description: Provides information on why the Transaction Status field has the specified value. .

columns.name: ThreeDSAcsChlngMandated
columns.description: Indication of whether a challenge is required for the transaction to be authorised due to local/regional mandates or other variable. Values accepted: Y = Challenge is mandated  N = Challenge is not mandated.

columns.name: ThreeDSChlngCompletionInd
columns.description: Indicator of the state of the ACS challenge cycle and whether the challenge has completed or will require additional messages. .

columns.name: ShippingAddressCity
columns.description: The city that was provided for the address.

columns.name: ShippingAddressZipCode
columns.description: The postal code that was provided for the address.

columns.name: ShippingAddressCountry
columns.description: The country/region code that was provided for the address. The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.name: StoreStoreId
columns.description: Store identifier in merchant system.

columns.name: StoreStoreName
columns.description: Store name in merchant system.

columns.name: StoreAddressZipCode
columns.description: The postal code that was provided for the address.

columns.name: StoreAddressCountry
columns.description: The country/region code that was provided for the address. The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.name: RecipientUserId
columns.description: The user identifier. This information is provided by the merchant.

columns.name: RecipientFirstName
columns.description: The user-provided first name on�the account.

columns.name: RecipientLastName
columns.description: The user-provided last name�on�the account.

columns.name: RecipientCountry
columns.description: The user's country or region.�The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.name: RecipientZipCode
columns.description: � The user's postal code.

columns.name: RecipientEmail
columns.description: The user's email address. This value is case-insensitive.

columns.name: RecipientProfileType
columns.description: The user's profile type. Possible values 'Consumer' , 'Seller' , 'Publisher' , 'Tenant' , 'Developer'.

columns.name: RecipientLoginInputMethod
columns.description: The way in which the customer input their credentials. Possible values are MANUALINPUT, AUTOFILL, SCRIPT, COPYPASTE, SELECTPROFILE.

columns.name: PICount
columns.description: The count of payment instruments used .

columns.name: PI0PymntMethod
columns.description: The top-level payment method category. Possible values are CARD, CASH, DIRECTDEBIT, E-WALLET, MOBILE, E-BANKING, INVOICE, VOUCHERS.

columns.name: PI0Type
columns.description: The type of payment. Possible values 'CreditCard' , 'DirectDebit' , 'PayPal' , 'MobileBilling' , 'OnlineBankTransfer' , 'Invoice' , 'MerchantGiftCard' , 'MerchantWallet' , 'CashOnDelivery' , 'Paytm' , 'CCAvenue'.

columns.name: PI0PymntCheckoutProvider
columns.description: The eWallet checkout provider.

columns.name: PI0CardType
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type. The network the card is provided from. Possible values 'Visa' , 'Mastercard' , 'Amex' , 'ACH' , 'SEPA' , 'UnionPay' , 'Inicis' , 'MobileBillingCarrier' , 'Discover' , 'AllPay' , 'JCB' , 'DiscoverDiners'.

columns.name: PI0Bin
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type.

columns.name: PI0BinName
columns.description: The BIN display name.

columns.name: PI0BinCountryISO
columns.description: The ISO country code associated with the BIN.

columns.name: PI0BinCardType
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type. The network the card is provided from. Possible values 'Visa' , 'Mastercard' , 'Amex' , 'ACH' , 'SEPA' , 'UnionPay' , 'Inicis' , 'MobileBillingCarrier' , 'Discover' , 'AllPay' , 'JCB' , 'DiscoverDiners'.

columns.name: PI0BinCardAssociation
columns.description: The BIN card association. Some possible values are VISA, MASTERCARD, AMEX, DISCOVER, MAESTRO, JCB, UNIONPAY, DINERSCLUB.

columns.name: PI0BinBankGroup
columns.description: The BIN bank group.

columns.name: PI0LastFourDigits
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type.

columns.name: PI0Email
columns.description: The email address associated with the payment instrument. This attribute is used only for payments of the Paypal type.

columns.name: PI0AuthzType
columns.description: The authorization type. Mastercard and Visa now require merchants to define authorization attempts as either a pre-authorization or a final-authorization. Possible values are PRE_AUTHORIZATION, FINAL_AUTHORIZATION.

columns.name: PI0AuthzResultCode
columns.description: Bank response from the authorization decision. Possible values are APPROVE, DECLINE, PENDING.

columns.name: PI0AuthzResultText
columns.description: Reasons for the authorization decision; especially for declined or pending transactions. Possible values are MISMATCH_CVV, MISMATCH_ADDRESS, MISMATCH_EXPIRATIONDATE, NOACCOUNT, INVALIDPIN, LOWFUND, OVERLIMIT SUSPICIOUSACCOUNT.

columns.name: PI0BillingAddressZipCode
columns.description: The postal code that was provided for the address.

columns.name: PI0BillingAddressCountry
columns.description: The country/region code that was provided for the address. The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.name: PI1PymntMethod
columns.description: The top-level payment method category. Possible values are CARD, CASH, DIRECTDEBIT, E-WALLET, MOBILE, E-BANKING, INVOICE, VOUCHERS.

columns.name: PI1Type
columns.description: The type of payment. Possible values 'CreditCard' , 'DirectDebit' , 'PayPal' , 'MobileBilling' , 'OnlineBankTransfer' , 'Invoice' , 'MerchantGiftCard' , 'MerchantWallet' , 'CashOnDelivery' , 'Paytm' , 'CCAvenue'.

columns.name: PI1PymntCheckoutProvider
columns.description: The eWallet checkout provider.

columns.name: PI1CardType
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type. The network the card is provided from. Possible values 'Visa' , 'Mastercard' , 'Amex' , 'ACH' , 'SEPA' , 'UnionPay' , 'Inicis' , 'MobileBillingCarrier' , 'Discover' , 'AllPay' , 'JCB' , 'DiscoverDiners'.

columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type. The network the card is provided from. Possible values 'Visa' , 'Mastercard' , 'Amex' , 'ACH' , 'SEPA' , 'UnionPay' , 'Inicis' , 'MobileBillingCarrier' , 'Discover' , 'AllPay' , 'JCB' , 'DiscoverDiners'.

columns.name: PI1BinBankGroup
columns.description: The BIN bank group.

columns.name: PI1LastFourDigits
columns.description: This attribute is used only for payments of the Credit/Debit Card type.

columns.name: PI1Email
columns.description: The email address associated with the payment instrument. This attribute is used only for payments of the Paypal type.

columns.name: PI1AuthzType
columns.description: The authorization type. Mastercard and Visa now require merchants to define authorization attempts as either a pre-authorization or a final-authorization. Possible values are PRE_AUTHORIZATION, FINAL_AUTHORIZATION.

columns.name: PI1AuthzResultCode
columns.description: Bank response from the authorization decision. Possible values are APPROVE, DECLINE, PENDING.

columns.name: PI1BillingAddressZipCode
columns.description: The postal code that was provided for the address.

columns.name: PI1BillingAddressCountry
columns.description: The country/region code that was provided for the address. The value should be a two-letter ISO country/region code (for example, US).

columns.description: The top-level payment method category. Possible values are CARD, CASH, DIRECTDEBIT, E-WALLET, MOBILE, E-BANKING, INVOICE, VOUCHERS.

columns.description: The type of payment. Possible values 'CreditCard' , 'DirectDebit' , 'PayPal' , 'MobileBilling' , 'OnlineBankTransfer' , 'Invoice' , 'MerchantGiftCard' , 'MerchantWallet' , 'CashOnDelivery' , 'Paytm' , 'CCAvenue'.

columns.name: Prod0ProdId
columns.description: Product identifier in merchant system.

columns.name: Prod0ProdName
columns.description: User-readable product name.

columns.name: Prod0Type
columns.description: Type of product sold. Possible values 'Digital' , 'Physical'.

columns.name: Prod0Category
columns.description: Category of product. Possible values 'Subscription' , 'Game' , 'GameConsumable' , 'GameDLC' , 'HardwareDevice' , 'HardwareAccessory' , 'SoftwareToken' , 'SoftwareDirectEntitlement' , 'ClothingShoes' , 'RecreationalEquipment' , 'Jewelry' , 'Hotel' , 'Ticket' , 'VehicleRental' , 'GiftCard' , 'Movies' , 'Music' , 'GarageIndustrial' , 'HomeGarden' , 'Tools' , 'Books' , 'HealthBeauty' , 'Furniture' , 'Toys' , 'FoodGrocery'.

columns.name: Prod0MerchantProdCategory
columns.description: Category of product as defined by the merchant in their system.

columns.name: Prod0Market
columns.description: Market in which product is offered.

columns.name: Prod0IsRecurring
columns.description: Indicates if product is recurring subscription.

columns.name: Prod0IsFree
columns.description: Indicates if product is offered for free.

columns.name: Prod0Quantity
columns.description: Quantity of item purchased.

columns.description: Product identifier in merchant system.

columns.name: ProdCount
columns.description: The count of products in order.

columns.name: MerchantRuleDecision
columns.description: Decision made by the Merchant Rules after getting Risk Score for a transaction. Possible values 'Approve' , 'Reject'.

columns.name: MIDFlag
columns.description: Recommended Merchant ID (MID) flag. Possible values 'Program' , 'Standard' , 'Control'.

columns.name: RiskScore
columns.description: Risk score calculated by Fraud Protection risk models in the range from -1 to 1000. -1 indicates an error determining a risk score.

columns.name: ReasonCodes
columns.description: Reason codes explaining the decision.

columns.name: PolicyApplied
columns.description: The name of the merchant rule or default rule that lead to the merchant rule decision.

columns.name: RuleEvaluations
columns.description: Contains the name of the rules evaluated to come to a decision.

columns.name: ClauseName
columns.description: Contains the name of the clause that gave the decision.

columns.name: DvcAttrUserAgntType
columns.description: Browser user agent type for the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrBrowserAgntLangs
columns.description: Browser user agent languages for the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrBrowserAgnt
columns.description: Browser user agent� for the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrCarrier
columns.description: Carrier used the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrDvcCity
columns.description: City where the device is located.

columns.name: DvcAttrDvcCountryCode
columns.description: Country code where the device is located.

columns.name: DvcAttrCookieEnabled
columns.description: Sgnifies if cookies are enabled on the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrJavaScriptEnabled
columns.description: Signifies if java script is enabled on the device .

columns.name: DvcAttrDvcId
columns.description: The device id of the device used .

columns.name: DvcAttrMimeTypesCount
columns.description: The mime type count on the browser used on the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrPlatform
columns.description: The platform for the device .

columns.name: DvcAttrFontsCount
columns.description: The number of fonts avaialble on the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrPlugins
columns.description: The plugins installed on the device browser.

columns.name: DvcAttrPluginsCount
columns.description: The plugin count installed on the device browser.

columns.name: DvcAttrDvcPostalCode
columns.description: Postal code where the device is located.

columns.name: DvcAttrScreenResolution
columns.description: The screen resolution used by device.

columns.name: DvcAttrDvcState
columns.description: The state of the device .

columns.name: DvcAttrTimeZoneOffset
columns.description: The time zone offset wrt UTC.

columns.name: DvcAttrTrueIp
columns.description: The trueip address of the device.

columns.name: DvcAttrProxy
columns.description: Signifies if the device is connecting via a proxy.

columns.name: BankName
columns.description: The name of bank used for the payment as proveded by bank service.

columns.name: DfpEnvironmentId
columns.description: The environment ID in DFP.

columns.name: PaymentInstrumentList
columns.description: The payment instruments used for the transaction.

columns.name: ProductList
columns.description: The products orders for the purchase .

columns.name: AadTenantId
columns.description: The aad Tenant Id for the merchant .

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables and service.
